ISSUE.TITLE: Is the enum name ReaderWriteLokeType a typo or the legit name?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.4.0.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: To view the file navigate to: Libraries -> Nop.Core -> ComponentModel -> ReaderWriteLokeType.cs The file name is ReaderWriteLokeType.cs but the enum declaration name is ReaderWriteLockType

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5667 Renamed a file according to enum name
